pages.text: $(o)These simple storage units secure resources for the my'ri. Being made of $(l:minebound:items/myrial_steel_ingot)myrial steel$()$(o), they're pretty blast resistant. A good place to cache your goods. Unfortunately, for a locker, they don't seem to lock too well...
Found in $(l:minebound:structures/crashed_ship)crashed ships$() and $(l:minebound:structures/ruined_base)ruined bases.$() Requires netherite to mine. Drops various vanilla ores when broken.
